data.actual_result: You are kicked from voice on desktop but not connected to the channel on mobile. System Settings: Android 4.4.2 (Samsung Galaxy S3)
data.expected_result: You are kicked from voice on desktop and connected to the voice channel on Android.
data.short_description: When connecting to a voice channel that your already in on your desktop, you are disconnected on desktop but not connected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel on desktop - Join a voice channel on the same server
